mapper.select: select pit.ACADEMY_ID, at.ACA_NM, at.FA_RDNMA, at.FA_RDNDA, at.REALM_SC_NM, at.LE_CRSE_LIST_NM, at.FA_TELNO from purchase_info_tb pit left outer join product_tb pt on(pt.product_id = pit.product_id) left outer join academy_tb at on(at.ACADEMY_ID = pit.ACADEMY_ID) where now() <= date_add(purchase_date, interval pt.product_period DAY) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
